entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Greater Napanee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:48 p.m. EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Rain showers or flurries at times heavy beginning early this evening then changing to flurries at times heavy later this evening and ending this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming light late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
